author: stefan2
msg: command line parameters to svnserve. The latter two are only
available (on the CL) if FSFS is supported.
Currently, the file handle cache is not being used but will be soon.

(main): parse the new parameters; update the FSFS cache settings

author: neels
msg: Treat svn_depth_unknown as svn_depth_infinity when checking whether to
skip child nodes. Because of r981470, this doesn't fix anything anymore,
but it still seems the right thing to do.
